paper_title.ja: Almost comparability and related comparabilities in von Neumann regular rings

publication_name.ja: Proceedings of the 42nd Symposium on Ring Theory and Representation Theory

paper_title.en: Regular Rings Satisfying Generalized Almost Comparability

description.en: We study regular rings satisfying generalized almost comparability. First, we determine the forms of regular rings satisfying generalized almost comparability. Next, using the above result, we treat the strict cancellation property and the strict unperforation property for regular rings satisfying generalized almost comparability.

paper_title.en: Von Neumann regular rings satisfying weak comparability

description.en: The notion of weak comparability was first introduced by K.C. O'Meara, to prove that directly finite simple regular rings satisfying weak comparability must be unit-regular. In this paper, we shall treat (non-necessarily simple) regular rings satisfying weak comparability and give some interesting results. We first show that directly finite regular rings satisfying weak comparability are stably finite. Using the result above, we investigate the strict cancellation property and the strict unperforation property for regular rings satisfying weak comparability, and we show that these rings have the strict unperforation property, which means that nA < nB implies A < B for any finitely generated projective modules A, B and any positive integer n.

paper_title.ja: Von Neumann regular rings with comparability

publication_name.ja: Proceedings of the 39th Symposium on Ring Theory and Representation Theory

paper_title.en: On regular rings satisfying almost comparability

description.en: In this article, we study regular rings satisfying almost comparability. We first show that, for regular rings, almost comparability is inherited by finitely generated projective modules and finite matrix rings, and, as a main result, we prove that the strict cancellation property holds for the family of all finitely generated projective modules over directly finite regular rings satisfying almost comparability.

paper_title.ja: On regular rings satisfying weak chain condition
paper_title.en: On Regular Rings Satisfying Weak Chain Condition

description.ja: In this paper, we shall study regular rings satisfying weak chain condition. As main results, we show that regular rings satisfying weak chain condition are unit-regular, and show that these rings have the unperforation and power cancellation properties for the family of finitely generated projective modules.

publisher.ja: Department of Mathematics, Faculty of Science, Okayama University
publisher.en: Department of Mathematics, Faculty of Science, Okayama University

paper_title.en: On regular rings with the property (DF)

description.en: A regular ring R is said to satisfy the property (DF) if the class of directly finite projective R-modules is closed under finite direct sums. The notion of the property (DF) was first given by the author in 1985, from considerations for directly finiteness of projective modules over directly finite regular rings with the comparability axiom, and it was proved in 1996 that unit-regular rings with s-comparability have the property (DF). In this paper, we study regular rings with the property (DF).

publisher.en: WORLD SCIENTIFIC PUBL CO PTE LTD

paper_title.en: On Von Neumann regular rings with weak comparability

description.en: O'Meara (1991) first gave the notion of weak comparability for regular rings, to prove that every simple directly finite regular ring with weak comparability is unit-regular. In this article, we investigate properties for regular rings with weak comparability, and we show that the strict cancellation property and the strict unperforation property hold for the family of all nonzero finitely generated projective modules over these rings. Also, we show that weak comparability for regular rings is Morita invariant.

paper_title.en: A construction of unit-regular rings which satisfy (DF)

description.en: A (von Neumann) regular ring R is called. to satisfy the property (DF) if every direct sum of two directly finite projective R-modules is directly finite. We give new constructions of unit-regular rings which satisfy the property (DF), by investigating some factor rings of direct products of unit-regular rings.

paper_title.en: On von Neumann regular rings with weak comparability

description.en: In 1991, K.C. O'Meara first defined the notion of weak comparability for regular rings, and he showed that every simple directly finite regular ring with weak comparability is unit-regular. In this paper, we investigate properties for regular rings with weak comparability, and we show that the strict cancellation property and the strict unperforation property hold for the family of directly finite finitely generated projective modules over these rings. (C) 2003 Elsevier Science (USA). All rights reserved.

paper_title.en: On von Neumann regular rings with weak comparability
Regular rings with comparability and some related properties
Regular rings with comparability and some related properties

description.en: We treat unit-regular rings satisfying weak comparability, and show that all matrix rings of factor rings of these rings have the property special (DF). Also a new condition (C) which is related to weak comparability is given, and it is shown that every stably finite regular ring satisfying the condition (C) has the property (DF).

We treat unit-regular rings satisfying weak comparability, and show that all matrix rings of factor rings of these rings have the property special (DF). Also a new condition (C) which is related to weak comparability is given, and it is shown that every stably finite regular ring satisfying the condition (C) has the property (DF).

paper_title.en: On some properties of simple unit-regular rings
